Key Match Events: Trey Sweeney hit a three-run home run in the first inning
Riley Greene hit a home run in the first inning
Jake Cave and Nolan Jones started the fifth inning with singles
Ezequiel Tovar hit a two-run double in the fifth inning
Brenton Doyle followed with an RBI single
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers improved to 20-8 since Aug. 11
The Tigers are three games behind Minnesota for the last American League wild card
Others: Casey Mize allowed four runs and six hits in 4 2/3 innings
Tyler Holton (6-1) got the win with two scoreless innings of relief
Ryan McMahon led off the second with a home run to get the Rockies on the board
